lead_paragraph: A happy and healthy New Year to you all from us at Slap Shot. The Winter Classic on Friday between the Flyers and the Bruins should be a great way to ring in the new year.
snippet: The major hockey event of the decade, the N.H.L. owners' lockout, changed the league, perhaps forever.

headline.main: The Morning Skate: A Pivotal Decade in Hockey

abstract: The major hockey event of the decade, the N.H.L. owners' lockout, changed the league, perhaps forever.
